extendedInfo.description: Coloring game for all young soccer, baseball, basketball, hockey, icehockey and waterpolo coloring fans.Sport coloring book kids game. Nice game for children with coloring pages of sports. Do you love soccer or basketball? Are you a hockey, baseball or waterpolo fan? And do you love coloring pages? Then this game is for you. Children can color the coloring pages of all sorts of sport on aphone or tablet. - Coloring book games with 50 coloring pages of sports.- Coloring pages of baseball, soccer, basketball, hockey, icehockey an waterpolo in this game.- Free drawing game. Draw your own drawings on a clean sheet of paper- Save your sports drawing or share it with a friend.- Fill an entire region, draw with a pencil and eraser- Undo and redo your last drawing or color actions- Over 60 colors to choose from to color a horse or pony.Girls and boys: start coloring now with this sport coloring book kids game. For all fans of soccer, basketball, waterpolo or baseball.
